AggOO::gradient_lut

Detailed Description

template<class ColorT, unsigned ColorLutSize = 256>
class AggOO::gradient_lut< ColorT, ColorLutSize >

A class for generating a gradient look-up table. Similar to the class in AGG, but allows the interpolation to be specified (linear or step.)

Member Function Documentation

template<class T, unsigned S>
void AggOO::gradient_lut< T, S >::remove_all (  )  [inline]

Build Gradient Lut First, call remove_all(), then add_color() at least twice, then build_lut(). Argument "offset" in add_color must be in range [0...1] and defines a color stop as it is described in SVG specification, section Gradients and Patterns. The simplest linear gradient is: gradient_lut.add_color(0.0, start_color); gradient_lut.add_color(1.0, end_color); --------------------------------------------------------------------

template<class ColorT, unsigned ColorLutSize = 256>
void AggOO::gradient_lut< ColorT, ColorLutSize >::StepInterpolation ( bool  useStepInterp  )  [inline]

--------------------------------------------------------------------- Set whether to use step interpolation for the gradient
